RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 1 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 55. Claiming Purse 19400. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 18 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000, For Each $1,000 To $8,000 1 lb. (Races Where En tered For $6,250 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DIVA ROSE pressed the pace and closed to the lead two deep midway on the turn, drew clear nearing the eighth pole and was steadily handled in the stretch. REAL APPEAL chased through the backstretch, raced off the rail on the turn, lost some ground leaving the turn but finished well while dueling clear for second mid-stretch. MICHEAUX engaged in close early chase, rounded the turn about the four path and dueled through the stretch for third. WAGER WORTHY chased and raced in the five path on the turn, angled in leaving the turn then outfinished in the stretch duel for third. A BLONDE THING gave chase, raced in the six path of the turn and finished evenly outside. POWER SONDE chased through the backstretch, raced near the rail on the turn then flattened in the lane. MARLEESBEEBEE was reluctant to load then closed to the lead inside and set a pressured pace, was met at the rail midway on the turn and weakened leaving the eighth pole.

ENTRY.NAME: Marleesbeebee
ENTRY.COMMENT: reluctant to load,early lead inside,met rail mid turn,weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Diva Rose
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace,up 2d mid turn,cleared 1/8,steady urging lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 2 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 55. Maiden Claiming Purse 21200. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000, For Each $2,500 To $10,000 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COWGIRL SHINE took the lead nearing the three eighths pole and rated the pace, widened at the rail on the turn, was kept alert to mid-stretch then taken in hand the final sixteenth. SHAKE IT GIRL bobbled at the break then gave chase, raced near the rail on the turn and settled for second best. GOLDEN BLOSSOM gave chase, rounded the turn near the rail and came along for third mid-stretch. BLUE AGAVE chased and rounded the turn off the rail, then flattened inside the eighth pole. PARISIAN SUMMER gave chase, raced near the rail on the turn and ran evenly in the lane. SARATOGA CENTS chased outside, rounded the turn about the three path and ran evenly in the stretch. IRISH CREAM raced well back inside then eased to the outside into the lane. SUPER WICKED was hustled along with a brief early lead, gave chase toward the three eighths pole and faded in the three path of the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Cowgirl Shine
ENTRY.COMMENT: up near 3/8,rated pace,widened rail turn,in hand final 1/16

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Kathie Maybee, Karen King & Bernard King

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 3 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 15700. FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JULY 18, 2022. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 18 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,500, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Les s Not Considered In Eligibility)(W V A Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MS HEADLEY accelerated to the lead leaving the three eighths pole and set a pressured pace, widened at the rail on the turn and was steadily handled in the lane. TRUE HEIRESS gave chase, raced in the three path of the turn and finished well while gaining on the winner. NANCYSAIDSO exchanged contact with Prominent Henny at the break then gave chase, rounded the turn in the six path and dueled through the final sixteenth for third. ONE SMART COOKIE was brushed on the chute then gave chase through the backstretch, rounded the turn off the rail, came between horses mid-stretch and finished evenly. MISSING LINK chased through the backstretch, raced in the four and five paths on the turn and showed little in the lane. SHACKABOOM came in and made light contact with One Smart Cookie on the chute, gave close early chase but faded in the four path of the turn. PROMINENT HENNY exchanged contact with Nancysaidso leaving the gate, dueled with a brief early lead then faded past the three eighths pole.

ENTRY.NAME: Ms Headley
ENTRY.COMMENT: up past 3/8,set pressured pace,widened rail turn,driving finish

ENTRY.NAME: Shackaboom
ENTRY.COMMENT: came in,brushed chute,close early chase,faded 4p turn

ENTRY.NAME: Nancysaidso
ENTRY.OWNER: Devane William E and King Adam

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 4 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 48. Maiden Special Weight Purse 32700. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Weight, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BLUE MOUNTAIN contested the pace inside, took the lead nearing the quarter pole and held on under steady handling. LAS VEGAS BLVD contested the pace two deep, was met approaching the quarter pole but dug in to remain a close stretch factor. PHANTOM QUEEN chased inside, raced near the rail on the turn and ran evenly down the lane. SHY BELLA chased through the backstretch, raced off the rail on the turn and ran evenly in the lane. JUJU ON DA BEAT gave chase, rounded the turn near the rail, eased out into the lane and finished evenly. LADY GANGSTER gave chase through the backstretch, rounded the turn near the rail and showed little in the lane. FAR MORE became a bit edgy in the gate then chased outside and rounded the turn in the four and five paths. A GIRL HAS A NAME saved ground.

ENTRY.NAME: Blue Mountain
ENTRY.COMMENT: contested pace inside,up rail near 1/4,held on driving

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 5 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 92. Starter Allowance Purse 24000. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS SINCE JANUARY 18, 2021. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since December 18 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since November 18 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races W here Entered For $8,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JAMMIN JIMTOWN saved ground off the pace and was rated close through the backstretch, eased out with a bid at the quarter pole, exchanged light contact with Antipoison past the pole, dueled to the front leaving the eighth pole and raced clear inside the sixteenth. HONOR THE FLEET settled close in the three and four paths, challenged leaving the three eighths pole and had the lead past the five sixteenths, gave up the lead on the far turn but held on for second. GOLDEN APPEAL rounded the opening turn six wide and settled off the pace from the seven eighths pole, eased out with a bid into the backstretch, came through the far turn about the four path and finished evenly to take third the final strides. ANTIPOISON rounded the first turn five wide and settled off the pace, bid past the seven sixteenths pole, exchanged light contact with Jammin Jimtown in the four path leaving the quarter pole then flattened stride inside the sixteenth. MIRACLE SILVER stalked inside, gave chase leaving the nine sixteenths pole then flattened off the rail on the far turn. PROTA took the lead five wide into the first turn then moved toward the inside to rate the pace, was met and dueled Honor The Fleet from the three eighths pole, gave up the lead past the five sixteenths and faded at the rail on the far turn. ONE TWO KID settled off the pace in the three and four paths, raced wide into the backstretch and was not a factor. NORTHERN RIDGE raced off the pace in the three path the first turn, gave chase leaving the second turn but faded through the backstretch. The Stewards reviewed then dismissed a claim of foul for alleged interference past the quarter pole, lodged by the rider of Antipoison, against the rider of Jammin Jimtown.

ENTRY.NAME: Jammin Jimtown
ENTRY.OWNER: A and B Racing Stable LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground,rated close,eased out,brushed turn,clear past 1/16

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Appeal
ENTRY.COMMENT: 6wd early,eased out bid 1/2,4p far turn,even finish,up 3rd late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 6 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 59. Maiden Special Weight Purse 32700. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BARBERS POINT took a quick lead and rated the pace inside, was only mildly hand urged leaving the quarter pole, increased her lead at the rail on the far turn and coasted through the lane. NO DENYING DENIS rounded the opening turn about the three path, picked up the chase nearing the three eighths pole, raced off the rail on the far turn, eased outward into the lane and dug in to take second later yards. SPARKLEINYOUREYE stalked the early pace from the two and three paths, gave chase leaving the three eighths pole, rounded the far turn at the rail then flattened in the lane. AMELIA'S DREAM rounded the opening turn in the four path and settled close leaving the turn, gave chase approaching the three eighths pole, came through the far turn about the three path then flattened inside the eighth pole. ODINA rated close inside, picked up the chase leaving the seven sixteenths pole but flattened at the rail on the far turn. JACKYSINTHECASTLE saved ground, gave chase leaving the three eighths pole but flattened in the three path of the far turn. GOLDEN SALLY saved ground off the pace, gave chase from the three eighths pole but flattened at the rail on the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Odina
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated close inside,chased 7/16,flattened rail far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Barbers Point
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated pace inside,mild hand urging 1/4,rail turn,coasted lane

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Sally
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved early ground,chased 3/8,flattened rail far turn

ENTRY.NAME: No Denying Denis
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3p 1st turn,chased 3/8,off rail far turn,eased out1/2,up 2nd late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 7 7F Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 36300. FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, WAIVER CLAIMING, RESTRICTED OR STATE BRED RACES OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $25,000. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winner s Of A Race Since December 18 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since November 18 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Races Where Entered For $20,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances)(W V A Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MOMA TIGER tapered in and stalked the early pace, gave chase from the seven sixteenths pole, took the lead two deep approaching the five sixteenths, dueled clear midway on the far turn and was steadily handled in the lane. AZZURRA saved ground on the first turn and entered the backstretch about the three path, bid leaving the three eighths pole, raced close in the three path of the far turn but proved no match in the lane. MISS CHAMITA saved ground on the first turn, started a bid nearing the seven sixteenths pole, raced at the rail on the far turn then dueled through the stretch for third. QUIET IMAGINATION raced close on the first turn, bid leaving the three eighths pole, rounded the far turn in the two and three paths then outfinished in the stretch duel for third. SHERIFF'S KID rounded the first turn in the three path, gave chase from the seven sixteenths pole and raced in the four path of the far turn, left the turn outside and showed little in the lane. BEARAKONTIE took the lead and moved to the inside to rate the pace, came under pressure leaving the three eighths pole, was caught approaching the five sixteenths and faded through the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Bearakontie
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated pace inside,pressured 3/8,caught rail near 5/16,faded turn

ENTRY.NAME: Azzurra
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground,3p 1/2,bid 3/8,close 3p far turn,no match lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 8 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 15700. FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JULY 18, 2022. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 18 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,500, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Les s Not Considered In Eligibility)(W V A Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MARVELLA NASTY took the lead at the three quarter pole and tapered in to rate the pace, was urged away from the five sixteenths pole, extended her lead at the rail on the far turn then taken in hand the final sixteenth. ONEPRETTYTHING settled close off the rail on the first turn, bid nearing the three eighths pole and rounded the far turn off the rail then dueled to a clear second later yards. SEEDS OF TIME saved ground on the first turn, picked up the chase from the three eighths pole, raced near the rail on the far turn, then relented in the stretch duel for second. ONLY REWARD'S settled back off the rail on the first turn, gave chase from the seven sixteenths pole, raced in the four path of the far turn and ran evenly through the lane. MY EXPENSIVE GIFT saved early ground, picked up the chase nearing the seven sixteenths pole, raced off the rail on the far turn and ran evenly in the stretch. SHAK'S HIDDEN GEM rated close inside, gave chase from the seven sixteenths pole but flattened at the rail on the far turn. SO RED THE ROSE rounded the opening turn in the four path, picked up the chase from the three eighths pole then flattened in the three path of the far turn. CATHERINES WARRIOR came away a bit awkwardly and raced in the five path the first turn, left the turn outside and showed little response through the backstretch.

ENTRY.NAME: My Expensive Gift
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground,chased 7/16,off rail far turn,evenly lane

ENTRY.NAME: Shak's Hidden Gem
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated close inside,chased 7/16,flattened rail far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Only Reward's
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off rail,chased 7/16,4p far turn,evenly lane

ENTRY.NAME: Oneprettything
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled close,bid 3/8,off rail far turn,cleared 2nd later yards

ENTRY.NAME: So Red the Rose
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown Nicole and Brown Ronney W

ENTRY.NAME: Marvella Nasty
ENTRY.OWNER: Bush Racing Stable and Liberty House Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated pace inside,urged away 5/16,rail turn,in hand 1/16
